reviewText: Contents: Box big enough to hold the entire series. Includes a 1/6 scale action figure of Hand Maid May. Figure has 9 points of articulation and comes with stand. Some assembly required. Also includes a CD-ROM disk (in a dvd case) with additional production, images and story information from the show. You'll need a web browser, 1024x768 screen and 64meg of memory to use (according to the box it's Mac & Windows friendly). Includes NO dvds, just the space (once the model is removed) to store them.
